name: Broken Engine - GMTK Game Jam 2020
description:
In Broken Engines, you must infiltrate and destroy the core of an enemy base. However, your ship became permanently damaged while entering the base, and your main thruster engine is now always on. But, nonetheless, you still must complete this mission!

https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/
Thank you to Fesliyan Studios for background music!

https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/packs/16681/
Thank you to LittleRobotSoundFactory for sound effects!
